question_text: A technician needs to maximize GPU performance on a board with limited PCIe lanes. Which configuration is ideal?
answer_options: Install the GPU in any available slot
Use an x1 slot for the GPU to reserve bandwidth
Install the GPU in a slot with full x16 electrical support
Install two x8 GPUs for better load balancing
correct_answer: Install the GPU in a slot with full x16 electrical support
explanation: To maximize GPU performance, it should be installed in a PCIe x16 slot that is also electrically wired for 16 lanes.
